info.title: Audiobookshelf API
info.description: Audiobookshelf API with autogenerated OpenAPI doc

get.summary: Get a single author by ID on server

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Author ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A comma separated list of what to include with the author. The options are `items` and `series`. `series` will only have an effect if `items` is included.

parameters.name: library
parameters.description: The ID of the library to to include filter included items from.

oneOf.description: An author object which includes a description and image path.

asin.description: The Audible identifier (ASIN) of the author. Will be null if unknown. Not the Amazon identifier.

description.description: A description of the author. Will be null if there is none.
description.example:
Terry Goodkind is a #1 New York Times Bestselling Author and creator of the critically acclaimed masterwork,
‘The Sword of Truth’. He has written 30+ major, bestselling novels, has been published in more than 20
languages world-wide, and has sold more than 26 Million books. ‘The Sword of Truth’ is a revered literary
tour de force, comprised of 17 volumes, borne from over 25 years of dedicated writing. Terry Goodkind's
brilliant books are character-driven stories, with a focus on the complexity of the human psyche. Goodkind
has an uncanny grasp for crafting compelling stories about people like you and me, trapped in terrifying
situations.

imagePath.description: The absolute path for the author image located in the `metadata/` directory. Will be null if there is no image.

addedAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when added to the server.

updatedAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when last updated.

oneOf.description: The author schema with an array of items they are associated with.

patch.summary: Update a single author by ID on server. This endpoint will merge two authors if the new author name matches another author in the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Author ID

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The Audible Identifier (ASIN).

schema.description: The Audible identifier (ASIN) of the author. Will be null if unknown. Not the Amazon identifier.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name of the author.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description of the author.

parameters.name: imagePath
parameters.description: The new absolute path for the author image.

allOf.description: An author object which includes a description and image path.

description.description: A description of the author. Will be null if there is none.

imagePath.description: The absolute path for the author image located in the `metadata/` directory. Will be null if there is no image.

addedAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when added to the server.

updatedAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when last updated.

allOf.description: Whether the author was updated without errors. Will not exist if author was merged.

merged.description: Will only exist and be `true` if the author was merged with another author

delete.summary: Delete an author image from the server and remove the image from the database.

patch.summary: Return the author image by author ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Author ID

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The requested width of image in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The requested height of image in pixels. If `null`, the height is scaled to maintain aspect ratio based on the requested width.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The requested output format.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Return the raw image without scaling if true.

post.summary: Match the author against Audible using quick match. Quick match updates the author's description and image (if no image already existed) with information from audible. Either `asin` or `q` must be provided, with `asin` taking priority if both are provided.

parameters.description: Author ID

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The Audible Identifier (ASIN).

schema.description: The Audible identifier (ASIN) of the author. Will be null if unknown. Not the Amazon identifier.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The name of the author to use for searching.

allOf.description: An author object which includes a description and image path.
